name: Recbid
slogan: A digital recruitment marketplace aligning business with specialist rated recruiters
description: Recbid, the recruitment services marketplace, is a free online platform devoted to seamlessly connecting employers with specialist recruiters. Our community rated, data driven bidding platform helps employers and recruiters to easily engage and agree terms of business within an easily navigable dashboard.

jobs.title: Account Manager / Pre-Sales support
jobs.description:
Recbid is a recently launched digital marketplace providing services to the recruitment industry.

We are looking to hire an Account Manager/ Pre-sales Support role to boost the growth of our business. This is a flexible role where you will work hand-in-hand with the Client Engagement Manager to deliver effective sales and revenue to a truly market disrupting business.

As a company that is expected to grow in size year on year, this role has lots of opportunity for personal and professional growth.

Roles and Responsibilities; include but are not limited to

- Building key personal relationships with customers via phone, in-person and email

- Driving key accounts to maximise sales and revenue

- Campaign management

- Seeking out and growing business leads

- CRM system upkeep

- Reporting on the revenue, figures, and activity of the business's sales, including forecasting sales

- Creating key proposal pitches to gain business

- Supporting enquires from clients to help them use the product efficiently

Skills Required;

- University calibre candidate

- B2B experience

- Recruitment sector experience (desired)

- Passionate about technology

- Comfortable with a start-up environment

- Able to remain resilient amidst commercial challenges

- Able to work effectively under pressure

- Comfortable to negotiate and make effective pitches

- Comfortable with speaking to clients on a regular basis

- Previous experience in a similar role (desired)

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
We are a well-funded, “market disrupting” tech start-up, led by a highly experienced and successful leadership team, looking for a Business Development Manager to support the growth of our business. This is a client facing role in which the successful applicant will manage a territory of existing clients, new prospects and play a crucial role in the future direction of the company.This opportunity offers great room for development and progression within the company, and the chance to be behind something truly market changing.

Key Roles and Responsibilities: include but are not limited to

Drive Business Development in line with business objectives
Direct management of an assigned client base, including key accounts
Maintain regular client contact – face to face, email and telephone as necessary.
Build long term, mutually beneficial client relationships
Be a strong ambassador for our business and engage with clients and prospects.
Book and Conduct Sales meetings with prospective new clients
Any other duties as the business demands

Skills Required

Ideally 3-5 years business development experience
Articulate, Professional and well presented
Attention to Detail
Strong work-ethic, ambition, drive and determination.
Strong organisational and time-management skills required for a flexible role.
Multi-tasking in a busy office environment is essential

jobs.title: Junior Bid Writer
jobs.description:
-This role is being posted on behalf of our client-

This is an exciting opportunity for the successful person to work for a well-established privately owned, family run business, involved with public sector bid management. Following a period of sustained growth and a focus on maintaining this development, Dukes have an opportunity for an ambitious person to develop their career in our Business Development Team as a Junior bid writer.
 
 We are looking for someone who is ready to take the opportunity to develop their career in a rapidly growing, dynamic company. If you have gained experience within journalism / professional writing or exposure to the tender response process within the public sector this could be the role for you.
 
 Key responsibilities:
 - Create responses and proposals for all pre-qualifications, tender submissions and significant enquiries received.
 - Overhaul and maintain the current response library so it can be drawn upon for future opportunities.
 - Identify and re-work existing pre-written content, where relevant.
 - Coordinate with internal stakeholders to obtain and deliver information.
 - Proactively collate feedback on tender results and report back to the business.
 - Manage online platforms and monitor alerts for available tenders.
 - Project manage the gathering of data for timescales and large projects.
 - Attend bid team meetings.
 - Prepare and deliver presentations that are cohesive and coherent to bids submitted.
 - Other ad-hoc duties as and when required.
 
 The individual should be self-motivated and able to write effective, concise and compelling content whilst under the pressure sometimes associated with deadlines.
 The role will be office-based at our Central London office, and the post holder may be required to work late on occasions to ensure deadlines for submissions are met. Travel to other UK offices may be required occasionally.

jobs.title: Marketing Generalist
jobs.description:
Recbid is a recently launched digital marketplace providing services to the recruitment industry.

We are looking to hire a Marketing Generalist to support the growth of our business. This is a flexible role where you will work hand-in-hand with the director to develop, learn new skills and be a part of a truly market disrupting business.

As a company that is expected to grow in size year on year, this role has lots of opportunity for personal and professional growth.

Roles and Responsibilities; include but are not limited to

Posting day-to-day digital content and social media communication across digital channels, as well as performance reporting.
Digital engagement with other social profiles.
Setting up and monitoring social media campaigns.
Creating and monitoring events on social media, across via platforms.
Prepare and feed into useful weekly and monthly reports.
Send out press releases and following up/tracking.
Making sure documents are updated and filed away correctly.
Generating client updates and monthly activity reports.
Making sure key dates are in diaries and monitoring these.

Skills Required;

Demonstrable immersion in online communities and working knowledge of managing social networking sites including Facebook, Twitter, lnstagram, LinkedIn and Youtube
Ambitious - as a growing company we need a growing, hungry team
Quick learner
Self starter with strong determination, ambition, and adaptability
Competent in Word, Excel, and Powerpoint
You will ideally have had exposure to many aspects of marketing including PPC, SEO, Social Media Management, PR and advertising, and digital marketing

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Recbid is a recently launched digital marketplace providing services to the recruitment industry.

We are looking to hire a Marketing Manager to support the growth of our business. This is a flexible role where you will work hand-in-hand with the director to develop our marketing campaign, take on a leading position and be part of a truly market disrupting business.

Key Roles and Responsibilities: include but are not limited to

Ensure the website is managed as regards content updates and visually
Social media channels are kept up to date with engaging content to generate leads to the sales pipeline.
Manage and develop all digital resources, paid and organic
Define marketing goals and KPIs
Prepare and present reports on campaign success
Create, implement and manage end-to-end campaigns to promote us to clients and prospects
Track your marketing campaigns and determine the most successful ones
Work with 3rd party agencies to ensure activities are defined and delivered on time and within budget
Drive better quality traffic, utilising optimisation methodologies and ongoing testing

Skills Required:

Undergraduate degree desirable
At least 2 - 3 years experience in marketing, preferably in a B2B environment
Demonstrable success in developing engaging content to generate sales leads.
Successful track record of leading business growth and developing new markets.
Experience of PPC, SEO, and Social Media management.

jobs.title: Senior Developer
jobs.description:
We are a “market disrupting” start-up, led by a highly experienced and already successful leadership team, looking for a Principal Software Developer to join our small dedicated tech team.

Working closely with our CTO/Architect, we are looking for a Full Stack developer (ideally with a front end bias), with strong HTML, Bootstrap, CSS JQuery plus a .NET background with exposure to Azure. Personality is very important as we are looking for individuals who have a passion for development with a 'get up and go' attitude. You will be working in a structured team of experienced developers with the freedom to have your say as we are open to new ideas and welcome suggestions of introducing newer technologies.
